page.title: 03Pencombe Village Hall.
page.content: {Pencombe parish hall}was built 50 years ago.It holds functions throughout the year;e.g.The archery club is on Monday nights, play-group is on Tuesday and Thursday mornings, Fetes and Young Farmers evenings. The Group Parish Council use the hall on every third Wednesday in the month and the Womens Institute use it every third Thursday in the month.They hold skittle evenings and Spring,Christmas fares.It is used for parties and Wedding receptions occasionally.{Mrs.G.Bayliss conducts "Brownies",Thursday evenings. The chairman of the Parish Hall Committee is{Mr.C.Thomas,The vice- {Chairman Mr.D.Pritchard,the secretary {is Mrs.A.Walsh}and quite a few local people form the commitee to keep the running of the place smoothly.The present caretaker is{Mrs.S.Tickle.
